definition: to shed tears while recounting sth/speaking in a tearful voice
entirely/without exception/(literary) to be together/to be alike
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action

sentences.english: I threw the brick because no one else would stop.
sentences.chinese: 我丟磚塊是因爲沒有人停下來，小男孩兒聲淚俱下。

sentences.english: Little green hurried to the hospital, and keep the coma ChenJiaLin voice tears accompany bottom.
sentences.chinese: 小綠趕到醫院，守著昏迷的陳嘉林聲淚俱下。

sentences.english: If the need arises, we may even break down in tears , until our parents cannot bear to be willful anymore.
sentences.chinese: 必要時還可以聲淚俱下，讓父母不忍心一意孤行下去。

sentences.english: He refused to listen to her tearful pleas.
sentences.chinese: 他對她聲淚俱下的懇求置之不理。

sentences.english: Tears streamed down his checks as he recounted his unhappy experience.
sentences.chinese: 他聲淚俱下地訴說了自己的不幸遭遇。

sentences.english: Her tears and moans were pitiful, as she sat holding her dead baby in her hands.
sentences.chinese: 她坐着，雙手抱住死嬰，聲淚俱下，令人心碎。
